name: Introduction to React.js
description: This module covers the basics of React.js, including component creation, state management, and props.

lessons.name: React Basics
lessons.description: Learn the fundamentals of React.js and how to set up a development environment

lessons.name: Components and Props
lessons.description: Understand how to create and use components and pass data using props

lessons.name: State and Lifecycle
lessons.description: Explore state management and the component lifecycle in React.js

name: Advanced React.js
description: This module delves into advanced topics in React.js, such as hooks, context API, and performance optimization

lessons.name: React Hooks
lessons.description: Learn about React hooks and how they can simplify your code

lessons.name: Context API
lessons.description: Understand how to manage global state using the Context API

lessons.name: Performance Optimization
lessons.description: Explore techniques for optimizing the performance of React applications

name: React.js Projects
description: This module focuses on building projects using React.js to consolidate learning

lessons.name: Project Setup
lessons.description: Learn how to set up and structure a React project

lessons.name: Building a To-Do App
lessons.description: Create a simple to-do application to practice React skills

lessons.name: Deploying React Apps
lessons.description: Learn how to deploy React applications to the web

name: Introduction to Python
description: This module covers the basics of Python programming, including syntax, data structures, and basic algorithms

name: Intermediate Python
description: This module explores intermediate topics in Python, such as object-oriented programming and error handling

name: Python Projects
description: This module focuses on building projects using Python to consolidate learning

name: Introduction to Java
description: This module covers the basics of Java programming, including syntax, data structures, and basic algorithms

name: Intermediate Java
description: This module explores intermediate topics in Java, such as object-oriented programming and error handling

name: Java Projects
description: This module focuses on building projects using Java to consolidate learning

name: Introduction to C/C++
description: This module covers the basics of C and C++ programming, including syntax, data types, and basic algorithms.

name: Intermediate C/C++
description: This module explores intermediate topics in C and C++, such as pointers, memory management, and object-oriented programming.

name: C/C++ Projects
description: This module focuses on building projects using C and C++ to consolidate learning.

name: Introduction to Go
description: This module covers the basics of Go programming, including syntax, data types, and basic algorithms.

name: Intermediate Go
description: This module explores intermediate topics in Go, such as goroutines, channels, and concurrency patterns.

name: Go Projects
description: This module focuses on building projects using Go to consolidate learning.

name: Introduction to PHP
description: This module covers the basics of PHP programming, including syntax, data types, and basic algorithms.

name: Intermediate PHP
description: This module explores intermediate topics in PHP, such as object-oriented programming, error handling, and web development.

name: PHP Projects
description: This module focuses on building projects using PHP to consolidate learning.

name: Introduction to Swift
description: This module covers the basics of Swift programming, including syntax, data types, and basic algorithms.

description: This module explores intermediate topics in Swift, such as object-oriented programming, error handling, and iOS development.

name: Swift Projects
